definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: Automatic extraction of Chinese basic vocabulary is the learning process.
sentences.chinese: 漢語基本詞彙提取是自學習的過程。

sentences.english: People with dementia can have profound problems remembering even basic words.
sentences.chinese: 癡呆的病人可能在想一些基本詞彙上都有嚴重的問題。

sentences.english: This is essential for developing your basic vocabulary and, more importantly, your pronunciation.
sentences.chinese: 這對掌握基本詞彙必不可少，尤其是發音。

sentences.english: The basic vocabulary of a language is those words that must be learnt.
sentences.chinese: 一種語言的基本詞彙是那些必須掌握的詞語。

sentences.english: To provide student with the vocabulary of business.
sentences.chinese: 使學生瞭解現代企業經營之基本詞彙與概念。

sentences.english: The vocabulary of this stage is 360, all of them are basic words.
sentences.chinese: 本階段的詞彙是360個，均爲基本詞彙。
